title: The terrible truth about Poro-Snax
body:
They're made with REINDEER! D:

My colleague brought these back from holiday and I couldn't help but laugh. :)

replies.body: It's a lie. It's supposed to be made with non-ZMO Freiljordian herbs.{{item:2054}}
**(that's code for Reindeer meat, herbs don't grow in Freljord, everything they told you is a lie)**
{{item:2044}} It's all a conspiracy
Mind = Blown
All the nightmares. ;w;
are poros now confirmed "most bloodthirsty carnivorous lifeforms of runeterra" to the point where champions need bait to feed them with in order to not become their next meal themselves?
well.... they ***DO*** keep the watchers in check . . . Somehow.
Wasn't Poro initally used because it was finnish for reindeer? I swear i remember reading in a thread somewhere that it was an internal name and somebody found it through looking at the game files.
Why would people simply assume that poros are herbivorous?

Cute and cuddly on the outside.

Deadly on the inside.
If read the actual item description, poro snax are made from game hens. Poros are scavengers that feed of the dead, frozen bodies scattered about the freljord.
so you're telling me i've been using a sejuani riding a reindeer?! GOOD LORD PRAISE THE HEAVENS HOLY MARY MOTHER OF JESUS! ( im not religious, but i am now after looking at this )
Also, soylent green is people
I live in Finland, and people eat horses, bears, rabbits and reindeer here :)
I've never eaten bears and rabbits here...

You should try, rabbits are amazing.

So are squirrels btw, but they are kinda hard to get at the butcher outside of Britain.
Pretty sure the NA account isn't living in Finland.

Having flash backs...
http://i.imgur.com/SHWai0Y.jpg

this conspiracy must have all the poro snacks destroyed
{{item:2052}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}}
Yeah, poro means reindeer in Finnish. I've always wondered if this was intentional. Hilarious though.
